body: This doujin sucks. Bremerton and Reno are depicted as sluts who would cuck the shikikan (completely out of character for both of them), and now the whole thing is available in color.
Bremerton is so boring. Both her personality and design are very  generic. Yet for some reason  she is one of most popular Azur Lane girls. Wtf.

bremerton : ship girl designed for hentai dj purpose only. but... shame most of the djs for her not that good (especially prolly coz she has locked fame for her tennis themed attire). wasted of thicc bod. used to obsessed with some azur ship girls chara designs, but their lack of plot, story, bg and personality as every harem-style & gacha game charas usually have, turn me off now. also not many good long dj bout'em (at least for me, since LOLICEPT/Belko's Taihou dj)
